title: Bug 18335 - Perspective contents lost when view is maximized
OB: When a view is maximized in the workbench, the perspective contents are lost. The perspective reverts to a temporary layout. This leads to the loss of any customized or saved changes in the perspective.
EB: The perspective contents should not be lost when a view is maximized. Instead, the proper layout of the perspective should be maintained, including any customized or saved changes.
SR:
Steps to reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the workbench with the desired perspective 
2. Arrange and customize the perspective layout 
3. Double-click or use the maximize button on a view 
4. Observe that the perspective contents are lost and the perspective reverts to a temporary layout
